name: Ravencrest
description:
The Citadel was once a place of power and unity, where humans and spirits lived in harmony. Now it is in ruins, but hope has not left this place, the few remaininnng members of Ravencrest who sworn to protect the city have returned and their sole mission is to bring back the spirits and revive this once magnificent place.

This is a short demo developed for university, but more content will be added as time goes on. 

The game is meant to be played with a controller only.
